quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因词根`soul`（灵魂）和`destroying`（摧毁的）直译，误将其理解为“摧毁灵魂的”，忽略其“令人极度沮丧/消磨意志的”比喻义
quiz_item.sentence: After working 12 hours a day in the factory, doing the same repetitive tasks over and over again, John felt that his job was truly **soul-destroying**.

option.definition: 令人极度沮丧的；消磨意志的
